animeDescription: When Nasa is called in to work suddenly, Tsukasa faces her first night alone since they married.Struck with loneliness, she takes ahold of the smartphone that Nasa gave her as a gift. Even when apart, they remain connected at the heart. (Source: Crunchyroll)
animeStaff: [['Ikehata, Hiroshi', 'Director'], ['Motoyama, Satoshi', 'Sound Director'], ['Hata, Kenjirou', 'Original Creator'], ['Shibutani, Yukihiro', 'Background Art, Art Director']]
